DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : - To test preliminary data node-positive oral squamous cell carcinoma ( OSCC ) signatures ability predict lymph-positive primary use cohort OSCC tumor . - To perform lymph node prediction use sentinel lymph node-biopsied primary . - To validate preliminary data node-positive OSCC signature test ability predict nodal status . OUTLINE : Patient tissue sample screen use polymerase chain reaction ( PCR ) human papilloma virus-specific primer . Samples analyze identify nodal-metastasis signature oral squamous cell carcinoma . Samples also undergo microarray analysis quantify expression level target gene . Initial data analysis perform use AffymetrixÂ® Microarray Suite 5.0 quantify expression level target gene .
DOC.criteria: Have primary tumor specimen bank American College Surgeons Oncology Group ( ACOSOG ) part clinical trial ACOSOGZ0360 * All tumor specimens squamous cell carcinoma tongue , floor mouth , gingiva All patient undergone neck dissection * Pathologically confirm nodal stage ( negative positive )
